availability.p: All research and writing of Civil War Governors of Kentucky Digital Documentary Edition annotations was undertaken by project staff, volunteers, and interns. Each record contains citations to relevant primary and secondary source material. All annotations are copyright Kentucky Historical Society, and should be referenced as such in any published work.

seriesStmt.title: Civil War Governors of Kentucky Digital Documentary Edition

person.persName: Daniel B. Kennedy (Hart County, Kentucky, farmer)

body.p: Hart County, Kentucky, farmer. Kentucky native. Married to Mary Kennedy. Father of John W. Kennedy, Jane Kennedy, Katy Kennedy, Feby Kennedy, Thomas Kennedy, Abram Kennedy, and William Kennedy. Farmer in Hart County in 1860. Owned three enslaved persons in 1860.

ab.bibl: Eighth Manuscript Census of the United States (1860), Population Schedules, Kentucky, Hart County, District No. 2, p. 118. Eighth Manuscript Census of the United States (1860), Slave Schedules, Kentucky, Hart County, District No. 2, p. 5.
